SELECT count(1) FROM linkman l,oldman_base o,organ org,auto_value x WHERE l.oldman_id=o.id AND x.id=o.xq_id AND org.id=x.parent_index and o.disable=0
and id=#{entity.id}
and org.id in ( SELECT case o.parent when 0 then child.id else o.id end id from organ o left join organ child on child.parent=o.id WHERE o.id=#{entity.organId} )
and (l.name LIKE concat('%',#{entity.search},'%') OR l.phone LIKE concat('%',#{entity.search},'%') OR l.relation LIKE concat('%',#{entity.search},'%') OR o.name LIKE concat('%',#{entity.search},'%') OR o.id=#{entity.search})
